postgresql_database: This database name will be used to create the 'dev' and 'prod' environment
postgresql_user: This database user will be used in 'dev' and 'prod' databases
postgresql_password_dev: This password will be ONLY used in the 'dev' environment
postgresql_password_prod: This password will be ONLY used in the 'prod' environment
domain: Url that is going to use the app in production (example.com)
email: This email will be used to configure the letsencrypt (hello@example.com)
